saveFile(File) - Static method in class eportfolio.Portfolio
 
searchInvestment() - Static method in class eportfolio.Portfolio
This function will prompt the user on the details of what investment they are searching for using the fields, ticker symbol(if applicable), keywords(if applicable) and price range(if applicable).
sellCurrentInvestment(String, int, double) - Static method in class eportfolio.Portfolio
This function when called will sell an investment.
sellInvestment() - Static method in class eportfolio.Portfolio
This function will prompt the user on details of the investment they want to sell and sell it for them according to what is inputted.
sellQuantity(int) - Method in class eportfolio.Investment
This function will calculate the new quantity when selling a certain number of the current investment.
